short_summary: Hiring Senior Project Manager for Homeowner Business Transformation Program
description: The Home-Owner Business Transformation program is a complex, multi-year program that modernizes technology, changes the way Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation works, and evolves the way it delivers its homeowner mortgage loan insurance business for its clients.
duration_in_months: guesstimate future duration call-in inquire about bidding deadline
full_summary:
# TASK BASED INFORMATICS PROFESSIONAL SERVICES (TBIPS) NOTICE

## NOTICE TITLE
 NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT FOR TASK BASED INFORMATICS PROFESSIONAL SERVICES

## CONTRACT REFERENCE AND DETAILS

* Contract Reference Number: cb-243-42773513
* Solicitation Number: Solicitation NPP-002775
* Publication Date: April 4, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: April 19, 2024 2:00 PM
* Amendment Date: April 19, 2024

## CONTRACT DETAILS

* Contract Title: Task Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS)
* Contract Category: Services
* UNSPSC Code: 80101600 (Project Management)
* Contract Valuation: Not Applicable
* Expected Contract Start Date: August 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: December 31, 2026

## PROCUREMENT DETAILS

* Procurement Method: Competitive Bidding
* Solicitation Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and others

## CONTACT INFORMATION

* Contracting Authority:
	+ Organization: Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC)
	+ Address: 700 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0P7
	+ Contact: David LaBerge
	+ Email: dlaberge@cmhc-schl.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (613) 748-4794
	+ Fax: Not Applicable

## TERMS AND CONDITION
The successful contractor shall be responsible for managing all facets of the HBT project, including budgeting, scheduling, procurement, quality, and risk. The contract will be for a period of three years, with an option to extend for an additional one year.

## ATTACHED DOCUMENTS
Please refer to the attached solicitation document for detailed information regarding the contract.
